name: Holiday Gift Boxes ğŸğŸğŸ
description:
If you are doing a virtual gift exchange, use these holiday gift boxes to customize the packaging on your gift!


Each gift box has 3 elements that can be edited:

  1. Bow
  2. Lid
  3. Box


There are multiple patterns and color styles to choose from so you can customize your gift wrap exactly how you want!


You could also get creative and create your own patterns!


The possibilities are endless!
